description: Number of identity bracelets of n beads of 5 colors.
links: F. Ruskey, Necklaces, Lyndon words, De Bruijn sequences, etc.
Index entries for sequences related to bracelets
mathematica: m=5; (* asymmetric bracelets of n beads of m colors *) Table[Sum[MoebiusMu[d](m^(n/d)/n - If[OddQ[n/d], m^((n/d+1)/2), ((m+1)m^(n/(2d))/2)]), {d,Divisors[n]}]/2, {n,3,20}] (* _Robert A. Russell_, Mar 18 2013 *)
author: _Christian G. Bower_
